name: Lee Enfield .303 rifle
description: The Lee–Enfield is a bolt-action, magazine-fed repeating rifle that served as the main firearm of the military forces of the British Empire and Commonwealth during the first half of the 20th century, and was the British Army's standard rifle from its official adoption in 1895 until 1957. The WWI versions are often referred to as the SMLE, which is short for the common Short, Magazine, Lee–Enfield-variant.
description_schinese: Lee-Enfield 是一种栓动、弹匣供弹的连发步枪，是 20 世纪上半叶英国和英联邦军队的主要火器，也是英国陆军从其官方开始使用的标准步枪。 1895 年至 1957 年采用。 WWI 版本通常被称为SML​​”，它是常见的Short, Magazine, Lee-Enfield变体的缩写。
